name: Run Wacho Run
description:
Your team scored! Joy flows through your body like electricity through a wire. Now, what's the best way to celebrate?

RUNNING NAKED THROUGH THE FIELD, OF COURSE!

The guards aren't too happy about your glorious, fleshy, and probably illegal parade. You will have to outrun them for as long as possible.

Will you be able to display your full-on herculean body for more than 2 seconds? Will the guards arrest you? Will the one and only football deity stop your charade? You'll have to find out!

Run, celebrate, exhibit! Delay The Inevitable Criminal Records!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move.

Items:

Red Card: Removes all enemies visible on screen.

Nostalgic Cassette: Become invincible for 5 seconds.

Mega Hot Dog: Raises movement speed.

Stadium Burger: Applies a one time use shield.

Grape Nanaos: Inverts the player's movement.

Vuvuzela: Stuns enemies visible on screen for 5 seconds.

Fernet with Cola: Applies a screen shake effect.

Video game made by Image Campus students
